title: Samples (USA), ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 35.5 cm [14"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 26 cm [10 1/4"]  Selvedge left side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 25.5 cm [10"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 25.5 cm [10"]  Selvedge left side, cut other side.
c. Warp: 27 cm [10.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 24.5 cm [9.5"]  Selvedge left side, cut other side.
d. Warp: 26 cm [10 1/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 24 cm [9.5"]  Selvedge right side, cut other side.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. grey ground with multi-color floral
b. green ground with multi-color floral
c. pink ground with multi-color floral
d. red gound with multi-color floral
